cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nai

sentence.kanji: ここには何も無い。
sentence.romaji: koko ni ha nani mo nai
sentence.english: There's nothing here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's amai

sentence.kanji: このイチゴは甘い。
sentence.romaji: kono ichigo ha amai
sentence.english: This strawberry is sweet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muri

sentence.kanji: 5時までに家に帰るのは無理です。
sentence.romaji: goji made ni ie ni kaeru no ha muri desu
sentence.english: I can't possibly get home by five o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakunaru

sentence.kanji: もうお金が無くなりました。
sentence.romaji: mou okane ga nakunarimashita
sentence.english: I've run out of money already.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kitai

sentence.kanji: みんな私たちに期待しています。
sentence.romaji: minna watashitachi ni kitai shite imasu
sentence.english: Everyone has high expectations of us.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikan

sentence.kanji: テスト期間は10日から15日までだ。
sentence.romaji: tesuto kikan ha tooka kara juugonichi made da
sentence.english: The test period is from the 10th to the 15th.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiki

sentence.kanji: 今はあなたにとって大事な時期です。
sentence.romaji: ima ha anata ni tote daiji na jiki desu
sentence.english: It's an important time for you now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teikiken

sentence.kanji: 定期券は1万2千円でした。
sentence.romaji: teikiken ha ichimannisenen deshita
sentence.english: The commuter pass was 1,2000 yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's motozuku

sentence.kanji: この話は真実に基づいています。
sentence.romaji: kono hanashi ha shinjitsu ni motozuite imasu
sentence.english: This story is based on truth.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kihon

sentence.kanji: 今、ジャズダンスの基本を習っています。
sentence.romaji: ima jazu dansu no kihon wo narate imasu
sentence.english: We're learning the basics of jazz dance at the moment.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kijun

sentence.kanji: 判断の基準が示された。
sentence.romaji: handan no kijun ga shimesareta
sentence.english: The standards of judgment were outlined.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakusu

sentence.kanji: 今日、鍵を無くしました。
sentence.romaji: kyou kagi wo nakushimashita
sentence.english: I lost my key today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hata

sentence.kanji: 旗が風に揺れている。
sentence.romaji: hata ga kaze ni yurete iru
sentence.english: The flag is waving in the wind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimau

sentence.kanji: 彼女は大切な書類を机に仕舞った。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha taisetsu na shorui wo tsukue ni shimata。
sentence.english: She put the important documents away in her desk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muri

sentence.kanji: 無理はしないでください。
sentence.romaji: muri ha shinai de kudasai
sentence.english: Don't overdo it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mucha

sentence.kanji: 無茶をしないでくださいね。
sentence.romaji: mucha wo shinai de kudasai ne
sentence.english: Don't be unreasonable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muryou

sentence.kanji: お飲み物は無料でございます。
sentence.romaji: o nomimono ha muryou de gozaimasu
sentence.english: Beverages are free of charge.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muyou

sentence.kanji: 心配は無用です。
sentence.romaji: shinpai ha muyou desu
sentence.english: There's no need to worry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenki

sentence.kanji: 前期の売上はとても良かったわ。
sentence.romaji: zenki no uriage ha totemo yokata wa
sentence.english: Sales during the first term were very good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanki

sentence.kanji: 明日から2週間、短期のアルバイトをします。
sentence.romaji: ashita kara 2 shuukan tanki no arubaito wo shimasu
sentence.english: For two weeks starting tomorrow, I'm doing a short stint as a part-time worker.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigen

sentence.kanji: 期限までに申し込みました。
sentence.romaji: kigen made ni moushikomimashita
sentence.english: I signed up before the deadline.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kijitsu

sentence.kanji: 代金を期日までにお支払いください。
sentence.romaji: daikin wo kijitsu made ni oshiharai kudasai
sentence.english: Please pay the charge by the due date.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's buji

sentence.kanji: 無事、家に着きました。
sentence.romaji: buji ie ni tsukimashita
sentence.english: I arrived home safely.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaki

sentence.kanji: 新学期が始まったね。
sentence.romaji: shingaki ga hajimata ne
sentence.english: A new semester has started.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shingaki

sentence.kanji: 今日から新学期が始まります。
sentence.romaji: kyou kara shingaki ga hajimarimasu
sentence.english: The new semester starts today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's museigen

sentence.kanji: このサイトでは音楽を無制限でダウンロードできる。
sentence.romaji: kono saito de ha ongaku wo museigen de daunro-do dekiru
sentence.english: You get unlimited music downloads on this site.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mushoku

sentence.kanji: アルコールは無色です。
sentence.romaji: aruko-ru ha mushoku desu
sentence.english: Alcohol is colorless.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's musen

sentence.kanji: 運転手が無線で話していたの。
sentence.romaji: untenshu ga musen de hanashite ita no
sentence.english: The driver was speaking on the radio.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukuchi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は無口な人ですね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha mukuchi na hito desu ne
sentence.english: She's a silent person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tankidaigaku

sentence.kanji: 彼女は短期大学で日本文学を勉強しました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha tankidaigaku de nihon bungaku wo benkyou shimashita
sentence.english: She studied Japanese literature in junior college.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mugon

sentence.kanji: 彼は一日中無言だったな。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ichinichijuu mugon data na
sentence.english: He was silent all day long.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukou

sentence.kanji: このクーポンはもう無効です。
sentence.romaji: kono ku-pon ha mou mukou desu
sentence.english: This coupon is already invalid.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muimi

sentence.kanji: そんなことをしても無意味よ。
sentence.romaji: sonna koto wo shite mo muimi yo
sentence.english: It's meaningless to do such a thing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mugen

sentence.kanji: 資源は無限ではありません。
sentence.romaji: shigen ha mugen de ha arimasen
sentence.english: Resources are not infinite.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muchi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は政治について無知でした。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha seiji ni tsuite muchi deshita
sentence.english: She was ignorant about politics.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muishiki

sentence.kanji: 私は無意識に彼を傷つけてしまった。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha muishiki ni kare wo kizutsukete shimata
sentence.english: Unintentionally, I ended up hurting him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kozukai

sentence.kanji: おじいちゃんにお小遣いをもらったよ。
sentence.romaji: ojiichan ni okozukai wo morata yo
sentence.english: I got pocket money from grandpa.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's musuu

sentence.kanji: 宇宙には無数の星があります。
sentence.romaji: uchuu ni ha musuu no hoshi ga arimasu
sentence.english: There are an infinite number of stars in space.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kichou

sentence.kanji: 彼は貴重な体験をしたわね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kichou na taiken wo shita wa ne
sentence.english: He had a valuable experience.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kichouhin

sentence.kanji: 貴重品は自分で持っていてください。
sentence.romaji: kichouhin ha jibun de mote ite kudasai
sentence.english: Please take your valuables with you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toutoi

sentence.kanji: その事故で貴い命が失われました。
sentence.romaji: sono jiko de toutoi inochi ga ushinawaremashita
sentence.english: A precious life was lost in the accident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kijun

sentence.kanji: この建物は建築の基準に達していないよ。
sentence.romaji: kono tatemono ha kenchiku no kijun ni tashiteinai yo 。
sentence.english: This building doesn't meet the construction standards.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mamonaku

sentence.kanji: あの飛行機は間も無く着陸しますね。
sentence.romaji: ano hikouki ha mamonaku chakuriku shimasu ne
sentence.english: That airplane will land soon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's amaeru

sentence.kanji: 彼女の親切に甘えました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no shinsetsu ni amaemashita
sentence.english: I depended on her kindness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's amayakasu

sentence.kanji: 子供を甘やかしてはいけないの。
sentence.romaji: kodomo wo amayakashiteha ikenai no
sentence.english: You must not spoil children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mugai

sentence.kanji: この農薬は人には無害です。
sentence.romaji: kono nouyaku ha hito ni ha mugai desu
sentence.english: This agricultural chemical is harmless to humans.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's enki

sentence.kanji: 運動会は雨で延期されました。
sentence.romaji: undoukai ha ame de enki saremashita
sentence.english: The athletic meet was postponed due to rain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's museibutsu

sentence.kanji: 岩は無生物に分類される。
sentence.romaji: iwa ha museibutsu ni bunrui sareru
sentence.english: Rocks are classified as inanimate matter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotobazukai

sentence.kanji: 先生にそんな言葉遣いをしてはいけません。
sentence.romaji: sensei ni sonna kotobazukai wo shite ha ikemasen
sentence.english: Do not speak to the teacher like that.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mushi

sentence.kanji: 彼の意見は無視されたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare no iken ha mushi sareta yo
sentence.english: His opinion was disregarded.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's musekinin

sentence.kanji: 無責任な行動は許されません。
sentence.romaji: musekinin na koudou ha yurusaremasen
sentence.english: Irresponsible behavior will not be tolerated.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouki

sentence.kanji: 後期の授業が始まりました。
sentence.romaji: kouki no jugyou ga hajimarimashita
sentence.english: The classes for the final term started.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kichi

sentence.kanji: ここは昔、軍事基地でした。
sentence.romaji: koko ha mukashi gunji kichi deshita
sentence.english: This used to be a military base.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muriyari

sentence.kanji: 荷物を無理やりかばんに詰めたよ。
sentence.romaji: nimotsu wo muriyari kaban ni tsumeta yo
sentence.english: I forced my belongings into the bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koki

sentence.kanji: 日本の国旗は描くのが簡単です。
sentence.romaji: nihon no koki ha kaku no ga kantan desu
sentence.english: It is easy to draw the national flag of Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiso

sentence.kanji: 今ドイツ語の基礎を学んでいます。
sentence.romaji: ima doitsugo no kiso wo manande imasu
sentence.english: We are learning the basics of German at the moment.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanjou

sentence.kanji: お勘定をして下さい。
sentence.romaji: okanjou wo shite kudasai
sentence.english: Can I have the check, please?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kan

sentence.kanji: 女の勘を甘く見てはいけません。
sentence.romaji: onna no kan wo amaku mite ha ikemasen
sentence.english: Don't underestimate a woman's intuition.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanchigai

sentence.kanji: 待ち合わせは2時だと勘違いしていました。
sentence.romaji: machiawase ha niji da to kanchigai shite imashita
sentence.english: I mistakenly thought the meeting was at two o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shochuumimai

sentence.kanji: 先生に暑中見舞いを出しました。
sentence.romaji: sensei ni shochuumimai wo dashimashita
sentence.english: I sent a summer greeting card to my teacher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oshimai

sentence.kanji: 話はこれでお仕舞いです。
sentence.romaji: hanashi ha kore de oshimai desu
sentence.english: This is the end of the talk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's butai

sentence.kanji: その物語は京都が舞台だ。
sentence.romaji: sono monogatari ha kyouto ga butai da
sentence.english: The story is set in Kyoto.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mimau

sentence.kanji: 昨日友人を見舞ったの。
sentence.romaji: kinou yuujin wo mimata no
sentence.english: I went to visit a friend in hospital yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mimai

sentence.kanji: 友達が見舞いに来てくれたよ。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi ga mimai ni kite kureta yo
sentence.english: My friend came to visit me in hospital.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanazukai

sentence.kanji: 祖父は古い仮名遣いで書くことがあるの。
sentence.romaji: sofu ha furui kanazukai de kaku koto ga aru no
sentence.english: My grandfather sometimes writes in the old kana orthography.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoki

sentence.kanji: 鼻水は風邪の初期症状のひとつです。
sentence.romaji: hanamizu ha kaze no shoki shoujou no hitotsu desu
sentence.english: A runny nose is one of the initial symptoms of a cold.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kon

sentence.kanji: 日本の制服は紺が多いね。
sentence.romaji: nihon no seifuku ha kon ga ooi ne
sentence.english: Many school uniforms in Japan are navy blue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsubusu

sentence.kanji: ペットボトルは潰して捨てましょう。
sentence.romaji: petobotoru ha tsubushite sutemashou
sentence.english: You should crush plastic bottles before throwing them away.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsubureru

sentence.kanji: 箱の角が潰れていますよ。
sentence.romaji: hako no kado ga tsuburete imasu yo
sentence.english: The corner of the box is squashed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teiki

sentence.kanji: 定期演奏会は年に4回あります。
sentence.romaji: teikiensoukai ha nen ni 4 kai arimasu
sentence.english: There are regular concerts four times a year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kabuki

sentence.kanji: 歌舞伎の芝居を見に行きました。
sentence.romaji: kabuki no shibai wo mi ni ikimashita 。
sentence.english: I went to see a kabuki play.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gobusata

sentence.kanji: 長いこと御無沙汰いたしました。
sentence.romaji: nagai koto gobusata itashimashita
sentence.english: I have been out of touch with you for a long time.
